Text: what about the english subtitles?how do we understand?

@Saurabhrock: Firstly, I'm glad you are interested to watch other regional movies as well! I'm very sorry, but this is one such movie that you don't find on the Internet easily. This is a VCD version of the movie, and hence there are is no sub-title available, yet. Hopefully someone comes up with the same for the movie, so that everybody could enjoy it! I wud definitely love to create the sub-title for the movie, but I don't have the amount of patience it takes to do that!!

I will update you guys if I find a sub-title for this :)

Sorry for not seeding it regularly. I have lot of other downloaded torrents that I seed. I will start seeding it again, but I can't seed it all the time. I'll make sure at least one person gets the complete movie while I seed.
